articles.content: The total number of cases infected with the new coronavirus disease (Covid-19) strain that was first reported in the United Kingdom, stands at 82 in the country, the Union ministry of health and fami… [+2207 chars]

articles.author: Antony Sguazzin
articles.title: South Africa coronavirus strain more transmissible, but not more severe - ThePrint
articles.description: The emergence of the 501.V2 variant has caused a political spat between South Africa and the UK, where a similar mutation is driving up infection rates.
articles.content: Johannesburg: The new coronavirus strain identified in South Africa appears to be more transmissible than earlier variants and has accelerated the onset of a second wave of infections, according to a… [+2579 chars]
